title: Learn to Draw Like the Masters: Dragons
description: Discover master artists’ secrets as you learn how to draw fantastical dragons Similar to the award-winning Paint Like a Famous Artist , this title teaches aspiring artists how to create works of art that are inspired by great artists of the past. Combining clear art instructions for drawing dragons with magical “facts” and secrets from the exciting world of dragons, this book offers readers the chance to learn as they draw. A wide variety of artistic techniques are featured, including pencil drawing, pastel, acrylic, watercolor, and oil, to inspire artists to explore different mediums. Each technique is introduced by a master artist––such as Da Vinci, Reubens, or Picasso––so readers can discover new techniques and learn about famous artists at the same time!
author: Eugene Caine
